snippet.title: Blockara - Now Available for Wii U and PC!
snippet.description:
Buy on Wii U: http://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/blockara-wii-u
Buy on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/652090/Blockara/
Buy it on itch.io: https://hauntedbees.itch.io/blockara

Blockara is a head-to-head action puzzle game where you, one of the best alchemists in the world, must compete in the World Alchemy Tournament for a chance to have your wish granted by the September Dragon! Fight your way to the top in Story Mode or hone your skills in the other game modes!


Website: http://blockara.com
Press: http://hauntedbees.com/press/sheet.php?p=blockara
Twitter: https://twitter.com/hauntedbees
Tumblr: http://blockara.tumblr.com
Email: press@hauntedbees.com

©2015-2017 Sean Finch/Haunted Bees Productions.
